h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Bee Mountain Stone Location
content: The Bee Mountain Stone can be obtained from the Temple of Yellow Flowers at the Mountain Trail Shrine in The Webbed Hollow. From the Shrine, continue forward up a short flight of stairs. Once you reach another short flight of steps, loop around to your left to find the Soak in a container on a bench.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Bee_Mountain_Stone.md', within the main section titled 'Bee Mountain Stone', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Bee Mountain Stone Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Bee Mountain Stone can be obtained from the Temple of Yellow Flowers at the Mountain Trail Shrine in The Webbed Hollow. From the Shrine, continue forward up a short flight of stairs. Once you reach another short flight of steps, loop around to your left to find the Soak in a container on a bench.
